primary_content.title: What you need to do next

content.description: To take part, all you need to do is check that you have the information you need to answer the survey questions.

content.title: Definition of innovation
list: Innovation, for the purpose of this survey, is defined as new or significantly improved goods or services as well as processes used to produce or supply all goods or services that {{ respondent.ru_name }} has introduced, regardless of their origin.
These innovations may be new to {{ respondent.ru_name }} or new to the market
Investments for future innovation and changes that {{ respondent.ru_name }} has introduced at a strategic level (in organisation and practices) are also covered

content.title: How we use your data
list: You cannot appeal your selection. Your business was selected to give us a comprehensive view of the UK economy
The data from you business is essential is it helps us calculate the GDP of the UK
